subject: Hockey, Ice
All Star Games
lead_paragraph: Latvians are flooding the All-Star voting in favor of their countryman Zemgus Girgensons, a second-year center for the Buffalo Sabres who has received more than twice as many votes as his nearest competitor.
snippet: Latvians are flooding the All-Star voting in favor of their countryman Zemgus Girgensons, a second-year center for the Buffalo Sabres who has received more than twice as many votes as his nearest competitor.
